channel.title: I don't get whats wrong with my compiler
channel.description:
I've tried many different compilers and codes, I have JDK 6u21 and I edited that in the compiler. I'm not sure what its issue is. Help would be appreciated.
[code]@echo off title Compiler "C:/Program Files/Java\jdk1.6.0_21/bin/javac.exe" -d ./bin ./src/*.java pause [/code]
I get: [code]Aintaro is using java Jdk 21 javac: file not found: src\server\event\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
::EDIT:: sorry, didn't realize the section for compilers.

item.title: I don't get whats wrong with my compiler
